description: Main entry point for the Flutter-based Recipe Explorer app, defining the root widget and initializing the app with a custom theme and home page.

classes.name: RecipeApp
classes.description: Root widget for the Recipe Explorer Flutter app, responsible for setting up MaterialApp with theme, title, and home page.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that runs the Flutter app by instantiating the RecipeApp widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for the RecipeApp widget, returning a MaterialApp configured with theme, title, home page, and debug banner settings.
